date.description: Retrieve the timestamp of the bounce records. It will return a date in a MySQL timestamp format â€“ YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS

days.description: Number of days in the past for which to retrieve bounces (includes today)

start_date.description: The start of the date range for which to retrieve bounces.

end_date.description: The end of the date range for which to retrieve bounces.

limit.description: Optional field to limit the number of results returned.

offset.description: optional beginning point in the list to retrieve from.

email.description: optional email addresses to search for.

start_date.description: The start of the date range for which to retrieve bounces.

end_date.description: The end of the date range for which to retrieve bounces.

start_date.description: Optional date to start counting from.

end_date.description: Optional date to end counting from.

bounces.get.description: Retrieve a list of bounces with addresses and response codes, optionally with dates.

type.description: choose the type of bounce to search for [enum:hard,soft]

bounces.delete.description: Delete an address from the Bounce list. Please note that if no parameters are specified the ENTIRE list will be deleted.

type.description: choose the type of bounce to search for [enum:hard,soft]
choose the type of bounce to search for [enum:hard,soft]

blocks.get.description: Retrieve a list of Blocks with addresses and response codes, optionally with dates.

blocks.delete.description: Delete an address from the Block list.

invalidemails.get.description: Retrieve a list of invalid emails with addresses and response codes, optionally with dates.

invalidemails.delete.description: Delete an address from the Invalid Email list. Please note that if no parameters are specified the ENTIRE list will be deleted.

invalidemails.count.description: Retrieve the number of invalid emails

unsubscribes.get.description: Retrieve a list of unsubscribes with addresses, optionally with dates.

unsubscribes.delete.description: Delete an address from the Unsubscribe list. Please note that if no parameters are specified the ENTIRE list will be deleted.

spamreports.get.description: Retrieve a list of spam reports with addresses and response codes, optionally with dates.

spamreports.delete.description: Delete an address from the Spam Reports list.

email.description: Email spam reports address to remove.

days.description: Number of days in the past to include statistics (includes today)

start_date.description: The start date to look up statistics.

end_date.description: The end date to look up statistics.
